headline: Nepotism, Poor Communication
pros: Bright, smart people.  Majority of employees have no egos, work hard and are easy to get along with. CEO is a decent guy who doesn't beat around the bush and is fair with compensation. Good work-life balance.
cons: Nepotism (manager without qualification in position unheard of elsewhere). Purposely vague communication that sends mixed messages and "gotcha" tactics.

headline: Bad work place culture
pros: Base Salary is good. Diverse environment.
cons: Bonuses for non research positions are basically nonexistent. Blatant nepotism, culture is not typical of a Hedge Fund.
